author: Gerry Moriarty
title: New Covid-19 powers introduced in North as death toll rises to 21
description: Among those suffering from virus is Belfast solicitor Niall Murphy who is critical but stable in hospital
content:
The number of deaths in Northern Ireland from coronavirus has increased to 21 after the Norths Public Health Agency (PHA) on Sunday reported there had been six more fatalities.
The PHA also reported 86 new confirmed cases of Covid-19, bringing the total of c… [+3233 chars]
